distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for SDL2 fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-13616: Fixed heap-based buffer over-read in BlitNtoN in video/SDL_blit_N.c (bsc#1141844).
- CVE-2019-13626: Fixed integer overflow in IMA_ADPCM_decode() in audio/SDL_wave.c (bsc#1142031).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in BlitNtoN in video/SDL_blit_N.c when called from SDL_SoftBlit in video/SDL_blit.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in Fill_IMA_ADPCM_block, caused by an integer overflow in IMA_ADPCM_decode() in audio/SDL_wave.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
